LanguageData.Ammo_130mmRocketMissile.label: 130mm fragmentation ammunition (HE)
LanguageData.Ammo_130mmRocketMissile.description: 130mm shells are prohibited by world conventions.
LanguageData.Ammo_130mmRocketFLMissile.label: 130mm phosphorus ammunition (P)
LanguageData.Ammo_130mmRocketFLMissile.description: 130 mm filled with white phosphorus, created according to a Parabellum patent. An inhumane weapon that is prohibited in many worlds.
LanguageData.Ammo_130mmRocketAntiMissile.label: 130mm Anti-material ammunition (Anti)
LanguageData.Ammo_130mmRocketAntiMissile.description: 130 mm filled with antimatter, one antimatter capsule is capable of powering a metropolis for a year, and we fire at raiders with it.
LanguageData.Ammo_130mmRocketEMIMissile.label: 130mm EMP ammunition (EMI)
LanguageData.Ammo_130mmRocketEMIMissile.description: 130 mm with EMI filling instantly turns off shields, turrets, mortars and disables mechanoids for 25 seconds.
LanguageData.Bullet_130mmRocketMissile.label: 130mm fragmentation ammunition (HE)
LanguageData.Bullet_130mmRocketFLMissile.label: 130mm phosphorus ammunition (P)
LanguageData.Bullet_130mmRocketAntiMissile.label: 130mm cluster anti-material missile (Anti)
LanguageData.Bullet_130mmRocketEMIMissile.label: 130mm EMP ammunition (EMI)
